data.actual_result: Discord acts as though you tapped the screen and brings up the keyboard
data.expected_result: Discord brings up the magnifying glass and the keyboard
data.short_description: Long pressing an emoji entry doesn’t bring up the magnifying glass if the keyboard was previously closed
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you can manage emoji - Open up the emojis page in settings - Long press one of the entries - Observe the screen
